```{r setup, include=FALSE}
library(learnr)
library(testthat)
library(mlr)

# .test_funs = new.env()
# lapply(list.files("ex_results"), function (file) source(paste0("ex_results/", file), local = .test_funs))

checker = function(label, user_code, check_code, envir_result, evaluate_result, ...) {

  test_case = paste0(label, "_test")
  test_results = try(get(test_case, envir = .test_funs)(envir_result), silent = TRUE)

  if (inherits(test_results, "try-error")) {
    return(list(message = attr(test_results, "condition")$message, correct = FALSE, location = "append"))
  } else {
    return(list(message = "Great job! :)", correct = TRUE, location = "append"))
  }
}

options(width = 100)
tutorial_options(exercise.eval = FALSE, exercise.timelimit = 60L)
```
